entries: This weapon holds the spirit of a master swordsman eager to pass on {@homebrew their|his} finer techniques. You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this weapon. It has the following additional properties:

items.name: First Lesson
entries: You gain proficiency in this weapon if you didn't already have it.

items.name: Watch My Hands
entries: When you roll a natural 1 on an attack with this weapon, ethereal hands readjust your stance, granting you advantage on your next {@action attack} with it before the end of your next turn.

items.name: Student and Master
entries: When you roll a natural 20 on an attack with this weapon, a spectral sword strikes in tandem with your own, causing the attack to deal an additional {@damage 1d8} magical slashing damage. This additional damage is not doubled by the critical hit.

images.altText: A digital artwork depicting the torso and legs of an armoured figure in a misty forest holding a sword bathed in swirling purple light.
